 27 require.def('antie/devices/broadcastsource/basetvsource',
 28     [
 29         'antie/class',
 30         'antie/devices/browserdevice'
 31     ],
 32     function (Class, Device) {
 33         /**
 34          * Contains an abstract implementation of the antie base broadcast TV source.
 35          * @private
 36          */
 37 
 38         /**
 39          * The play states
 40          */
 41         var PLAY_STATE_UNKNOWN = -1;
 42         var BaseTvSource = Class.extend(/** @lends antie.devices.broadcastsource.basetvsource.prototype */ {
 43             /**
 44              * @constructor
 45              * @ignore
 46              */
 47             init: function () {
 48                 throw new Error("Abstract class constructor should not be called directly");
 49             },
 50             /**
 51              * Displays the currently tuned channel
 52              */
 53             showCurrentChannel: function () {
 54                 throw new Error("Device broadcast source does not override abstract method showCurrentChannel");
 55             },
 56             /**
 57              * Stops the currently playing programme and turns the screen black
 58              */
 59             stopCurrentChannel: function () {
 60                 throw new Error("Device broadcast source does not override abstract method stopCurrentChannel");
 61             },
 62             /**
 63              * Get the current channel name from broadcast and return as a string.
 64              * @returns A string with the name of the current channel.
 65              */
 66             getCurrentChannelName: function () {
 67                 throw new Error("Device broadcast source does not override abstract method getCurrentChannelName");
 68             },
 69             /**
 70              * Sets the size and position of the visible broadcast source
 71              * @param top
 72              * @param left
 73              * @param width
 74              * @param height
 75              */
 76             setPosition : function(top, left, width, height) {
 77                 throw new Error("Device broadcast source does not override abstract method setPosition");
 78             },
 79             getPlayState : function() {
 80                 return PLAY_STATE_UNKNOWN;
 81             },
 82             /**
 83              * Reverts the current screen settings and performs any clean up required before
 84              * the user exits the application back to standard broadcast.
 85              */
 86             destroy : function() {
 87                 throw new Error("Device broadcast source does not override abstract method destroy");
 88             }
 89         });
 90 
 91         Device.prototype.isBroadcastSourceSupported = function() {
 92             return true;
 93         };
 94 
 95         return BaseTvSource;
 96     }
 97 );
